Forcing Glorious Blooms for the Holidays and Beyond!

Online Workshop with Val Schirmer

$49.95 – Get Lifetime Access. 7-Day Guarantee.

• Easy To Grow In Your Home

    Val shows you exactly how to select, grow, and design with your indoor blooms.

  • Unique Gifting Ideas

    Bonus handout included for friends & family so they too can regrow their rebulb again next year.

  • Regrow Your Bulbs

    Learn how certain bulbs need to be handled so they can be regrown again next year.
Your Instructor, Val Schirmer

• Nationally Recognized

    Val was awarded top 10 farmer-florists in the country by Martha Stewart Weddings.

  • Accomplished Leader

    Val is the President of the Association of Specialty Cut Flower Growers.

  • Established Flower Farmer

    Val started Three Toads Farm in 1997 with a vision to grow flowers that could stop people in their tracks.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 1 (6 mins)
settings.title: Welcome Intro
settings.text: Here I review the types of flowers featured in this course.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 2 (14 mins)
settings.title: How to Select the Right Bubs
settings.text: Learn my recommended source for bulbs & what I look for when selecting bulbs.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 3 (24 mins)
settings.title: How to Force Amaryllis
settings.text: I show how to break dormancy, prep blubs, & which varieties I prefer to grow.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 4 (27 mins)
settings.title: How to Force Paperwhites
settings.text: I cover how I prepare, force, & even plant paperwhites.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 5 (47 mins)
settings.title: Creating Gorgeous Displays with Amaryllis
settings.text: In this 2 part video, I show you the ideal stage to pot up your bulbs, my preferred vessels, & tips for elevating your design.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 6 (22 mins)
settings.title: How to Create Magazine-Worthy Displays with Paperwhites
settings.text: I review the soil, containers, & mosses I like to use when potting up my displays.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 7 (15 mins)
settings.title: How to Save Your Amaryllis to Rebloom Again Next Year
settings.text: I teach how to maintain your bulbs after flowering so you can regrow them again next year.

settings.subtitle: BONUS Lessons (35 mins)
settings.title: Gnat Tips & Shippable Gift Ideas
settings.text: In these bonus videos, I teach how to create the most unique gift ever and how to control gnats on your flowers.

settings.title: What is the difference between School courses and Workshops?
settings.content:
Workshops vary from sixty minutes to over four hours of instruction, see individual courses for details. Each of these courses offer lots of valuable information on a specific topic that you can digest in a short amount of time and put into action right away.

School course content is much more comprehensive and covers broad topics. School courses are meant to serve as a long-term reference tool that you will use all throughout the course of your flower farming journey. Each course includes 6 modules, which each contain multiple video training sessions, instructor worksheets, and handouts, and an FAQ archive. All of the course sessions (including the FAQs) are searchable by keyword, so you can always find and go directly to the information that you need at any given time.

settings.title: May I watch more than once?
settings.content: You have lifetime unlimited access to your purchased courses.

settings.title: Do I have unlimited access?
settings.content: You have lifetime unlimited access to your purchased courses.

settings.title: Do I have to watch at a certain time?
settings.content: You can watch the courses anytime at your convenience. Purchased On-Demand Courses will appear in your library immediately and will always be there for viewing.

settings.title: Do you offer course discounts?
settings.content: Yes, once you are part of our course family (owning any online school or workshop) you will be eligible for $50 off additional school courses.

settings.title: I live outside of the USA, may I purchase a course?
settings.content: Yes, our online courses are available internationally.

settings.title: Are the courses focused on growing in a specific region or area?
settings.content: No, the courses are based on methods to apply to any growing area.
